Reviews.Title: love this camera
Reviews.Author: Hawian32
Reviews.Content: I like, no love this camera.  It is nice and compact, so I can take it anywhere.  The touch screen is very useful and allows me to change the settings I want to take great pictures or even shoot a video if I want.  I'm not a professional photographer, but I think my pictures come out looking as if I was.  Its great that it uses AA batteries cause I can always just replace them on the go without having to find a wall outlet and then wait for a battery to charge.

Reviews.Title: Had to many problems with the one I bought
Reviews.Author: Armsmere
Reviews.Content: I had high hopes for this camera when I bought it.  I liked the low price and the reviews I read were pretty good.  Only thing I worried about was that people said the on/off switch was likely to turn on by accident, eating up batteries.  I figured I could deal with that by having a hard case and being careful.  When I got it, I found out that, at least on the one I had, the on/off switch was hard to get to turn on when you wanted it on and would turn on "by itself" when you didn't want it on.  I called it finicky.  I spent a lot of time trying to turn the thing on instead of capturing the shot I was after. Once I took pictures and loaded them on my laptop, the slideshows were marred by vertical grainy lines lines running through each shot.  I never tried printing a picture so I don't know if the lines showed up in print.  I sent the camera back and ordered a different one.  I bought  an 8.0 megapixel camera (fewer megapixels) and am very happy with it.  I think too many megapixels caused the problem with the grainy lines.  Who needs 12 or 16 megapixels anyway?

Reviews.Title: CW450T camera I GREAT
Reviews.Author: Shelest Jones
Reviews.Content: I Have the CW450t HP camera in color merlot, I LOVE THIS CAMERA and I record Video for as long as I want as long as I have a Big GB memory card the sound is crisp and loud and the video is clear so is the pics the touch screen is great and I have so many options of scenes, back grounds,.....ect and you can write, draw, and use art stamps on the pics there is a lot to choose from the only problem I have is that the shutter speed is a little slow and the zoom is just ok but its worth its money I just wish I had it in Ocean Blue but if your looking for an every day camera for that every moment this is the camera you want I took 1900 pics with this came already and only had it for a year

Reviews.Title: HP Products
Reviews.Author: Kathy
Reviews.Content: I love HP products, quick and easy and economically apt.thanks for a wonderful experience of online shopping, with all that goes on electronically, this was smooth.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: love the beach
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera in blue about a year and a half ago, and was very disappointed in it, for two reasons: The screen totally washed out in sunlight,so all my outdoor shots were just guessed at. The other problem is battery life - maybe I just got a bad one, but no matter what kind of batteries I tried, they didn't last. The camera seemed to drain the battery while it wasn't being used, so when I tried to take a picture, it just froze. I have since purchased a different brand of camera which has neither of these problems, and am extremely happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera at a low price
Reviews.Author: Humberto Boscán
Reviews.Content: It is incredible what this camera can do. It has characteristics of professional, much more expensive cameras. I recommend it

Reviews.Title: A touchscreen camera made for 1999
Reviews.Author: Disasterpiece Theatre "Danne"
Reviews.Content: I'm so used to touchscreen products having great attributes this one let me down. It cannot even record video?!?! And the user interface is completely shoddy. I will not get another HP product in the near future.

ProductInfo.Features:
It offers 12 megapixel resolution allowing you to take pictures in great detail and vivid colors.
With over 25 scene modes, you can be sure the best shot will be taken in many different shooting situations.
The CW450T also takes AA batteries, making it a convenient camera for the road.
ProductInfo.Name: HP CW450T 12 MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7-Inch Touchscreen LCD (Merlot)
